184a5(mdo 'grel): pa dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad du bya ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du shes pa dang / kun shes pa dang / gdagra 
184a6(mdo 'grel): pa dang / tha snyad tsam gyi nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba dmigs par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 
184a7(mdo 'grel): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la 'du shes med cing kun shes pa med pa dang / gdags pa med pa dang / tha snyad med pa dang / ming med pa dang / ming du gdags pa med pa dang / lus 
184a8(mdo 'grel): med pa dang / lus kyi las med pa dang / ngag med pa dang / ngag gi las med pa dang / yid med pa dang / yid kyi las med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par 
184b1(mdo 'grel): byang ba med pa de/ ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom/ 
184b2(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / mi dmigs pa'i 
184b3(mdo 'grel): tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems 
184b4(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen pos sgyu ma'i skyes bus bslabs pa ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bslab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi 
184b5(mdo 'grel): ste/ 'di lta ste/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po rnams so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ci phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs 
184b6(mdo 'grel): shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po rnams ni dngos 
184b7(mdo 'grel): po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin no// de bzhin du phung po lnga ni rmi lam lta bu'o// rmi lam yang dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin lags te/ dmigs su ma mchis so// de bzhin du phung po lnga po dngos po med 
184b8(mdo 'grel): pa'i rang bzhin gyis dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu dang / gzugs 
185a1(mdo 'grel): brnyan lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur 
185a2(mdo 'grel): ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ sgra brnyan ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin no// de bzhin du mig yor dang / sprul pa dang / gzugs brnyan 
185a3(mdo 'grel): nidangs po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhinate/ dmigs su ma mchis so// de bzhin du zung ba lnga pa na dngas pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis nang pags phra ma sa mas// mam nadapa 'dis kyi tsun pa sngam na dus 
185a4(mdo 'grel): tshor ba ni sgyu ma lta bu'o// 'du shes ni sgyu ma lta bu'o// 'du byed rnams ni sgyu ma lta bu'o// rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'o// rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de yang dbang po drug dang phung po lnga'o// de dag kyang nang 
185a5(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid kyis mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyis mi dmigs pa nas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis mi dmigs so// bcom ldan 'das gal te de skad du bshad pa na/ byang chub sems
185a6(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig mi zhum/ kun tu mi zhum/ 'gyod par mi 'gyur/ mi dngang / kun tu mi skrag/ kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad shes pa nyid du nges par 
185a7(mdo 'grel): 'byung bar 'gyur/ lam shes pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni dgu pa mi slob pa'i lam du btags pa'i rnam par rtog pa 
185a8(mdo 'grel): ste 'dzin rtog gnyis pa'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du 
185b1(mdo 'grel): zhugs pas bstan pa 'di thos nas zhum zhing kun tu zhum la 'gyod de/ dngang ba dang / kun tu skrag pa dang / kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA 
185b2(mdo 'grel): ri'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ thabs mi mkhas pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu song bar ma 
185b3(mdo 'grel): gyur na ni dngang zhing kun tu skrag pas zin par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang la spyod pas mi dngang / kun tu mi skrag/ kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
185b4(mdo 'grel): pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
185b5(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan 
185b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i sems kyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so// / 
185b7(mdo 'grel): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du byed rnams mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis rnam par 
185b8(mdo 'grel): shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de med dmigs so// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas par rig par bya'o// 
186a1(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog kyang de mi
186a2(mdo 'grel): dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so// rab 
186a3(mdo 'grel): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs stong zhes bya bar rtog/ gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang / gzugs zhi zhes 
186a4(mdo 'grel): bya ba dang / gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang / gzugs stong pa zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad 
186a5(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya ba dang / rnam
186a6(mdo 'grel): par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar so/ 
186a7(mdo 'grel): sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs 
186a8(mdo 'grel): mkhas pa yin par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid 
186b1(mdo 'grel): la byed pas mi dmigs pa'i tshul du chos ston pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa 
186b2(mdo 'grel): can de dag nyid kyi mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa nyid gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la 
186b3(mdo 'grel): byed pa can de dag nyid kyi bzod pa dang / 'dod pa dang so sor rtog pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
186b4(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa can de dag nyid kyi de mi 'dor ba gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 
186b5(mdo 'grel): ldan pa'i yid la byed pa can de dag nyid kyi nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa 'am/ mi dge ba'i chos gzhan gyi skabs mi 'byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
186b6(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mi dang nga / kun tu mi skrag/ kun tu 
186b7(mdo 'grel): skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur ro// // bam po bcu gnyis pa// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad 
186b8(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam pa 'di ltar rab tu rtog ste/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid nyid gzugs so// 
187a1(mdo 'grel): tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid tshor ba'o// 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du shes stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'du shes/ 
187a2(mdo 'grel): nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid 'du shes so// 'du byed rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du byed rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'du byed rnams nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid 'du byed rnams so// rnam par she
187a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi stong pa nyid kyis mig stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig nyid stong pa nyid 
187a4(mdo 'grel): do// stong pa nyid nyid mig go/ rna ba'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid rna ba'o// sna'i stong pa nyid kyis sna stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid 
187a5(mdo 'grel): nyid sna'o// lce'i stong pa nyid kyis lce stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid lce'o// lus kyis stong pa nyid kyis lus stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid lus so// / 
187a6(mdo 'grel): yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis yid stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid yid do// gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid 
187a7(mdo 'grel): gzugs so// sgra'i stong pa nyid kyis sgra stong pa ma yin gyi/ sgra nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid sgra'o// dri'i stong pa nyid kyis dri stong pa ma yin gyi/ dri nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid dri'o// ro'i stong 
187a8(mdo 'grel): pa nyid kyis ro stong pa ma yin gyi/ ro nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid ro'o// reg gi stong pa nyid kyis reg stong pa ma yin gyi/ reg nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid reg go/ chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos 
187b1(mdo 'grel): stong pa ma yin gyi/ chos nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid chos so// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid// 
187b2(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid nyid mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid rna ba'i rnam par she 
187b3(mdo 'grel): pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa 
187b4(mdo 'grel): nyid kyis lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong
187b5(mdo 'grel): pa ma yin gyi/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi ni/ 
187b6(mdo 'grel): par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid/ 
187b7(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid nyid mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid rna ba'i 'dus te reg
187b8(mdo 'grel): pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid 
188a1(mdo 'grel): kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus 
188a2(mdo 'grel): te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid/ snang pa nyid nyid lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus de dag pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 
188a3(mdo 'grel): pad / na rdzu na sa bkun sa pa ma / 
188a4(mdo 'grel): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid mig ge 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba steng 
188a5(mdo 'grel): pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshar ba nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid rna pa'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshar ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 
188a6(mdo 'grel): rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna'i 'dus de reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis 
188a7(mdo 'grel): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis 
188a8(mdo 'grel): tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshar ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// 
188b1(mdo 'grel): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid yid kyi 'dus so// 
188b2(mdo 'grel): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o// 
188b3(mdo 'grel): yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs rnams kyang de bzhin na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa snang ba ma yin 
188b4(mdo 'grel): gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sa/ 
188b5(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni skrag par mi 'gyur/ kun tu grag par mi 'gyur/ kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni yongs su 
188b6(mdo 'grel): 'dzin pa dang po thabs la mkhas pas yongs su zin pa yin no// / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag gis yongs su bzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bstan pa thos 
188b7(mdo 'grel): nas me dang / kun tu mi skrag kun du skrag pa dang ldan par ma 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di 
188b8(mdo 'grel): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la gzugs minag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa 
189a1(mdo 'grel): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su brjod mi 'jug pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 
189a2(mdo 'grel): par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 
189a3(mdo 'grel): par sangs su bathar pa 'gyub pa/ raba'abyang den kyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa yin pa dgra par ba shes gzhan du dag par bya'o// da kyang shan nas cung chub thams dpa' thams dpa 
189a4(mdo 'grel): chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba 
189a5(mdo 'grel): dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs 
189a6(mdo 'grel): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / gang de la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ces bya bar de mi dmigs 
189a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar 
189a8(mdo 'grel): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa 
189b1(mdo 'grel): ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen
189b2(mdo 'grel): ni gang de la mig mi rtag pa ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / 
189b3(mdo 'grel): mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar de me dmigs pa'i tshul rgyas tshas ston cing dge ba rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad ma tshan pa nyid ma gnags par nyan zas kyis / 
189b4(mdo 'grel): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / gang de la rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba 
189b5(mdo 'grel): dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad 
189b6(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 
189b7(mdo 'grel): rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug 
189b8(mdo 'grel): bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 
190a1(mdo 'grel): sa na na sa sasas sa 
190a2(mdo 'grel): dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong 
190a3(mdo 'grel): ma/ napa gas mu 
190a4(mdo 'grel): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang 
190a5(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi 
190a6(mdo 'grel): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya 
190a7(mdo 'grel): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug 
190a8(mdo 'grel): pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
190b1(mdo 'grel): ba dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lu'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 
190b2(mdo 'grel): dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag 
190b3(mdo 'grel): med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad 
190b4(mdo 'grel): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes 
190b5(mdo 'grel): gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / 
190b6(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston 
190b7(mdo 'grel): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang 
190b8(mdo 'grel): pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med/ 
191a1(mdo 'grel): ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / skong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba 
191a2(mdo 'grel): de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med 
191a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag 
191a4(mdo 'grel): par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / 
191a5(mdo 'grel): dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
191a6(mdo 'grel): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa lam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya ste/ dge ba'i/ 
191a7(mdo 'grel): bshes gnyen des yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa zos na/ me ngang / kun tu mi skrag/ kun du skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro// 
191a8(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas dngang zhing kun tu 
191b1(mdo 'grel): srag la kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba thabs mi mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song bar 'gyur ba ji lta bu zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la 
191b2(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing 
191b3(mdo 'grel): dmigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral bas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ bsam 
191b4(mdo 'grel): gzhan gyi pha rol du phyin pa des kyang rnam sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral bas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa snyam zhing dmigs te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa 
191b5(mdo 'grel): des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral bas bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs de/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / 
191b6(mdo 'grel): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yid la byed pa dang thal bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i 
191b7(mdo 'grel): yid la byed pa dang bral bas sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa de lta bu ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab 
191b8(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mi mkhas par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
192a1(mdo 'grel): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral bas gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed// 
192a2(mdo 'grel): gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa dang bral bas tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par 
192a3(mdo 'grel): shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed pa dang / rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa dang bral bas rnam par shes pa dngos po med 
192a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// mig nang stong pa zhe 
192a5(mdo 'grel): bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ 
192a6(mdo 'grel): te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed// 
192a7(mdo 'grel): yid phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ ci nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom
192a8(mdo 'grel): sems su byed pa dang / gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs kyi stong pa zhes bya ba yid la byed/ gzugs kyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
192b1(mdo 'grel): kyibar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ spa dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos kyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos kyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos dngos po 
192b2(mdo 'grel): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes 
192b3(mdo 'grel): bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 
192b4(mdo 'grel): kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la 
192b5(mdo 'grel): byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa gyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar 
192b6(mdo 'grel): yid la byed cing nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa phyi
192b7(mdo 'grel): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg 
192b8(mdo 'grel): pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
193a1(mdo 'grel): byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing nang stong pa 
193a2(mdo 'grel): nyid de yang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang song pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar dang / de bzhin du mig gi 'dus te reg pa nas yid 
193a3(mdo 'grel): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba kyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 
193a4(mdo 'grel): rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / 
193a5(mdo 'grel): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshong ba nang stong pa zhes bya ba yid la byed// 
193a6(mdo 'grel): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phye stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus de dag pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang song ba zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i 
193a7(mdo 'grel): ngo bo nyid song pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / sa'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ 
193a8(mdo 'grel): sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba yid la byed/ sa'i khams kyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yad la byed/ sa khams dngos po med pa'ongo ba nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ces bya bar yid la byed/ chu'i khams dang / 
193b1(mdo 'grel): me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes
193b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i khams phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa 
193b3(mdo 'grel): phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / 
193b4(mdo 'grel): ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rgashe gyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la 
193b5(mdo 'grel): byed/ rga shi phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rga shi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid des
193b6(mdo 'grel): kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral 
193b7(mdo 'grel): bas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom zhing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de bzhin du yang dag par 
193b8(mdo 'grel): spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa
194a1(mdo 'grel): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams sgom par byed cing 
194a2(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
194a3(mdo 'grel): pal spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar thabs mi mkhas pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas/ dngang zhing kun tu skrag la/ skrag pas zin par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sdig 
194a4(mdo 'grel): ba'i grogs pos zin pa gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa thos nas/ dngang zhing kun tu skrag la skrag pas zin par 'gyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa'i grogs pos zin par 
194a5(mdo 'grel): ji ltar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i thogs po na gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thal bar byed pa dang / 
194a6(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba byed pa ste/ 'di ni de 
194a7(mdo 'grel): bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin/ 'di ni chos ma yin/ 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin gyis/ 'di la bslabs par bya ba'i mi cha'o// mdo sde 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa ste/ 'di dag ni mnyan par mi bya'o// gzung bar mi bya'o// 
194a8(mdo 'grel): bcang bar mi bya'o// klag par mi bya'o// kun chub par mi bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya'o// 'di dag ni gzhan la bstan par mi bya'o// zhes zer ba 'di ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
194b1(mdo 'grel): po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud sdig to can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas pa dag byang chub sems 
194b2(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug las zlog cing mos pa med par byed de/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin 
194b3(mdo 'grel): brnams pas kya sa 9/ ban grus nyams pas kyang ma \u0f7f/ pa ldan can pan sa / [] / @ 
194b4(mdo 'grel): khyod la ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba 'ong ngo zhes bdud kyi las mi ston/ bdud kyi nyes pa mi ston pa 'di ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig 
194b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byang du byas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo dang / dbyangs kyi bsnyad pa 
194b6(mdo 'grel): dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la phab 
194b7(mdo 'grel): par bstan pa dag ston te/ 'grel lo// rnam par 'byed do// gsal bar byed do// yongs su ston to zhes bdud kyi las rnam pa 'di lta bu dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig
194b8(mdo 'grel): pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod la ni byang chub kyi sem 
195a1(mdo 'grel): cung zad kyang med/ khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa yang ma yin/ khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus so zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i 
195a2(mdo 'grel): bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang 
195a3(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i drung du byin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu mig ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // gzugs ni bdag 
195a4(mdo 'grel): gam bdag gis stong ngo // swa dang / dr-i dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mig gi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis song ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa 
195a5(mdo 'grel): dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / 
195a6(mdo 'grel): sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mig gi 'dus de reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 
195a7(mdo 'grel): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 
195a8(mdo 'grel): ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
195b1(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi phyi rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 
195b2(mdo 'grel): dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar ni bdag gam bdag gis stong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon 
195b3(mdo 'grel): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te yang ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang 
195b4(mdo 'grel): bdud sdig can dag rang sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' 
195b5(mdo 'grel): dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yang med do// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang med do// nyan thos zhes bya ba yang med do// lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho 
195b6(mdo 'grel): dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yang med do// 
195b7(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang med do// nyan thos zhes bya ba yang med do// zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par 
195b8(mdo 'grel): bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag nyan thos kyi cha byad du byas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las zlog cing nyan
196a1(mdo 'grel): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
196a2(mdo 'grel): sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag mkhan po dang slob dpon gyi cha byad du byas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las 
196a3(mdo 'grel): klog cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las zlog ste// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi na pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnam 
196a4(mdo 'grel): dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i bar gyi chos rnams la sbyor zhing / de ltar rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos de 
196a5(mdo 'grel): dag yongs su sgoms la nyan thos kyis mngon du gyis shig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi sgra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sem 
196a6(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag pha dang ma'i cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du bla na med pa yang
196a7(mdo 'grel): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ de'i don du ni bskal pa tshad med grangs med par 'khor ba na 'khor zhing / rkang lag dang mgo bcad pa tshad med pas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis/ 
196a8(mdo 'grel): gang la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya bar yod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya bar yod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya bar yod pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya 
196b1(mdo 'grel): bar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig ces zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig 
196b2(mdo 'grel): can dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / 
196b3(mdo 'grel): zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar 
196b4(mdo 'grel): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston

197a7(mdo 'grel): pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus de reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / 
197a8(mdo 'grel): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa 
197b1(mdo 'grel): dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang /

197b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i lam yan lag brjod pa rnams mi nag ces bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma

197b5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya ste/ de ltar shes nas kyang yongs su spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni yongs su 'dzin pa gnyis pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa yin no// 
197b6(mdo 'grel): 'di dag gis ni nges par 'byed pa'i yan lag bzhi bstan dono// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' zhes 
197b7(mdo 'grel): bgyi ba'i tshig 'di'i don gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don ni tshig gi don med pa ste/ de tsil 
197b8(mdo 'grel): phyir zhe na/ byang chub la ni skye ba 'am/ yod pa nyid dam med pa nyid yod pa'am dmigs pa ma yin te/ rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med pa'o zhes bya ba ni rigs kyi rang gi ngo bo yin no// 
198a1(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bya'i rjes med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper 
198a2(mdo 'grel): na/ rmi lam la gnas med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma la gnas med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin 
198a3(mdo 'grel): du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ smig rgyu la gnas med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so//

198a7(mdo 'grel): ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos nges pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid la gnas med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang 
198a8(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni rtse mor gtogs pa'i rten can yin no// / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs la gnas med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de/

199a8(mdo 'grel): ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 
199b1(mdo 'grel): 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems 
199b2(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 
199b3(mdo 'grel): rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs 
199b4(mdo 'grel): bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams 
199b5(mdo 'grel): dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
199b6(mdo 'grel): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni chos kyi mchog tu gtogs pa'i rten bstan pa yin no// // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin 
199b7(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
199b8(mdo 'grel): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams 
200a1(mdo 'grel): dang / rnam par shes pa la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems 
200a2(mdo 'grel): dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de 
200a3(mdo 'grel): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs ma// rab 'byor 'di lta/ ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
200a4(mdo 'grel): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol 
200a5(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po 
200a6(mdo 'grel): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
200a7(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun 
200a8(mdo 'grel): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sa sa yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med

200b2(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam gyi rten bstan pa yin no//

200b7(mdo 'grel): sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi skye ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so// gzugs kyi 'gag pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa dang / 'byung ba 
201a1(mdo 'grel): dang / dmigs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba la tshig gi

201b7(mdo 'grel): so// sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i phyir/ sems can dang / srog dang /

202a1(mdo 'grel): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i lam
202a2(mdo 'grel): gyi rten yin no// // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mngon par 'chang ba'i 'od la mun pa'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab

202b7(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / gza' dang / skar ma dang / nor bu rin po che dang / glog gi 'od la gnas med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
202b8(mdo 'grel): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni thun mong ma yin pa'i yon tan gyi rten yin no// // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal chen bzhin 
203a1(mdo 'grel): ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med cing mi dmigs so// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris

203a3(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi don gyi go rim gyi rten yin no// // rab 'thor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang

203a8(mdo 'grel): 'jug pa'i rten yin no// // 'di dag gis ni sgrub pa'i rten bstan no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar tshes thams 
203b1(mdo 'grel): cad kyi yod par gyur pa ma yin pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad rtogs par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams 
203b2(mdo 'grel): cad ces bya ba ni/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kha na ma tho ba dang 
203b3(mdo 'grel): bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / thun mong ba dang / thun mong ma yin pa dag ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / chos de dag thams cad kyi yod par

203b5(mdo 'grel): ba'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya ba ni phar shes pa dang / mar shes pa dang / dge sbyong du shes pa dang / bram zer shes pa dang / rigs kyi rgan pa la rim 
203b6(mdo 'grel): gror byed pa dang / sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bson nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / nyams su blang ba 
203b7(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa'i dngos po dang / thabs mkhas pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i 'du shes dgu ste/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes dang / 
203b8(mdo 'grel): rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes pa dang / rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par bsngos pa pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'thor ba pa'i 'du shes dang / rus pa pa'i 'du shes dang / 
204a1(mdo 'grel): rnam par chag pa'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / 'jig rten pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 
204a2(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten pa'i rjes su dran pa bcu ste/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa 
204a3(mdo 'grel): dang / dbugs kyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang / skyob rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa dag s+t+waM/ de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos zhes brjod do// gsol pa bcom ldan 
204a4(mdo 'grel): 'das 'jig rten pa'i mi dge ba'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag ste/ 'di lta ste/ rab 'byor srog gcod pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o// ma byin par len pa 
204a5(mdo 'grel): dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / rdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / tshig thub mo dang / ngag 'khyal pa dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba dang / khro ba dang / khon du 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa1

204a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lung du ma bstan pa'i lus kyi las dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i ngag gi las dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i yid kyi las dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i 'byung ba chen po 
204a8(mdo 'grel): bzhi dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i dbang po lnga dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i skye mched drug dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs med pa dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams dang / rnam par smin pa 
204b1(mdo 'grel): thams cad de/ de dag ni lung du ma bstan pa'i chos zhes brjod do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis 
204b2(mdo 'grel): dang / khams bco brgyad dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten pa'i chos gzhan gang / 
204b3(mdo 'grel): gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i chos gang dag yin pa ste/ 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos zhes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dran 
204b4(mdo 'grel): pa bar gzhag pa pan dang / yang dag par blang ba bzhi dang / ma kyi nang pa bzhi dang / dbang ba lnga dang / skabs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag 'dun dang / 'phags pa'i lam ldan pag na pa dang / rnam par ma 
204b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa dang / mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang 
204b6(mdo 'grel): po dang / rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / dran pa dang / shes 
204b7(mdo 'grel): bzhin dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gzugs la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams 
204b8(mdo 'grel): la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o// sdug par mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 
205a1(mdo 'grel): 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du
205a2(mdo 'grel): nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du 
205a3(mdo 'grel): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad med do snyam pa ci yang med pa'i skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched
205a4(mdo 'grel): las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par
205a5(mdo 'grel): bdas te/ 'du shes dang tshar ba 'gog pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa la/ 'di dag ni rnam par thor pa brgyad do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa dgu ste/ dgugang zhan 
205a6(mdo 'grel): 'di lta ste/ 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyi dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas/ dpyod pa dang bcas/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam par
205a7(mdo 'grel): rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin la skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa
205a8(mdo 'grel): nye bar bsrubs de gnas pa dang / de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba 
205b1(mdo 'grel): larnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa nye bar basbubs te gnas pa dang / de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub 
205b2(mdo 'grel): pas bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal ba yang med/ btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te thogs 
205b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par byung cing la tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mtha' mtha' yas sa snyam na// rnam cheb 'a mtha' mas rgyam da na par bsgrubs ni garnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad dunam ma ma 
205b4(mdo 'grel): yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam pas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag 
205b5(mdo 'grel): par 'das te/ cung zad med do snyam pas cung zad med pa'i skye mched nye bar bsgrubs de gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched 
205b6(mdo 'grel): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa ste/ 'di dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i/ 
205b7(mdo 'grel): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o// nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so 
205b8(mdo 'grel): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 
206a1(mdo 'grel): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams bco brgyad dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 
206a2(mdo 'grel): 'jug pa bzhi ste/ de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 
206a3(mdo 'grel): dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 
206a4(mdo 'grel): bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas kyi chos gang lag/ 
206a5(mdo 'grel): samaldan 'das kyis bka' sus pa/ rab 'thong 'dus rgyas kya sa nas bya ni/ dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i rnams dang / gzhanas khams gsum par gagags pa'i chos pa 
206a6(mdo 'grel): cung zad yod pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos shes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas 
206a7(mdo 'grel): kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi mngon pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags zad pa/ zhe sdang zad pa/ gti mug 
206a8(mdo 'grel): zad pa/ de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid/ chos nyid chos kyi dbyings/ chos gnas pa nyid/ chos nges pa nyid/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ rab 'byorade/ 
206b1(mdo 'grel): dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thun mong gi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms 
206b2(mdo 'grel): par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni byis pa sa so skye bo rnams dang thun mong gi chos zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thun mong ma lags pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 
206b3(mdo 'grel): bka' stsam pa/ rab 'byang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skabs bcu dang / me 'jigs pa bzhi dang / seM sa yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 
206b4(mdo 'grel): brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni thun mang ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ni rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir rang gi 
206b5(mdo 'grel): mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la chags par mi bya zhing / chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i tshul du rtogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa'i dmigs pa bstan pa yin no// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 
206b6(mdo 'grel): gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba gang brjod pa ci'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes 
206b7(mdo 'grel): bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la sems can gyi phung po chen po dang sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog nyid du byed par 'gyur ba de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// 
206b8(mdo 'grel): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi mchog nyid du byed par 'gyur ba sems can gyi phung po chen po dang / sems can gyi sde chen po dgang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
207a1(mdo 'grel): ga nga sang na / na ma sa nga/ phan nga / smra sgru pa nga/ / 
207a2(mdo 'grel): phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar dag ste/ rab 
207a3(mdo 'grel): 'byor de ni sems can gyi phung po chen po dang / sems can gyi sde chen po zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de'i phul byed par 'gyur ro// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 
207a4(mdo 'grel): na da/ / / na sa rgyu shu 
207a5(mdo 'grel): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du bdag gis 'khor ba dpag tu med pa sems can thams cad kyi don du go cha bgos nas bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang 
207a6(mdo 'grel): bar bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad yong 
207a7(mdo 'grel): ts+tsha pa sems sa rdzun pa dam pa / sa pa sa maud gas gas rnas rnams 
207a8(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ma 'dres pas pha rol tu phyin po drug la spyad par bya'o// bdag gis chos thams cad rjes su rtogs pa thams cad du spong ba la bslab par bya'o// bdag gis chos rnams kyi tshul gcig tu 
207b1(mdo 'grel): mngon par sgrub pa rtogs par bya'o// bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub pa rtogs par bya ba'i don du chos rnams la bslab par bya'o// bdag gis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon par sgrub pa 
207b2(mdo 'grel): rtogs pa'i don du chos rnams la bslab par bya'o// bdag gis bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa mngon par sgrub pa rtogs par bya ba'i don du chos rnams la 
207b3(mdo 'grel): bslab par bya'o// bdag gis stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par sgrub pa rtogs par bya ba'i don du chos rnams la bslab par 
207b4(mdo 'grel): bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/ rab 'byor 'di ni gang la gnas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog nyid du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed 
207b5(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur ba rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa yin no// rab 'byor gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du sems can dmyal ba pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i 
207b6(mdo 'grel): sems can ji snyed cig gis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba de dag don du sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
207b7(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen pos sems bskyed par bya ba ni/ 'di ltar ji srid du/ sems can de dag phung po lhag ma med par yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du bdag gis sems can re re'i don du yang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
207b8(mdo 'grel): nga mang bar sems can kyil pa dang / rung cang gyu na dang / gzhanardza gan 'jug pardza ma nyams pa myong ba masam ni rdus na thamams can thams ca rung pa ma lum pa'i bya na las nas 
208a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sems can thams cad kyi don du sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad nyams su myong bar byas te/ de nas 
208a2(mdo 'grel): gdod bdag gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas byang chub kyi tshogs bsags nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems 
208a3(mdo 'grel): bskyed par bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni gang gis sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog nyid du byed par 'gyur ba rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
208a4(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen pos sems bskyed pa gang gis sems can thams cad kyi latshig cu 'byung bar bya ba rlabs pa tshang sems su bya'o// del byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i sems rlabs pa chen 'di yin te/ 
208a5(mdo 'grel): sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar gzung nas 'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed/ zhe sdang gi soms mi skyed// gdi mug gi sems mi skyed/ gtso ba'i sems mi skyed/ zhan thos kyi sems dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyang mi skyed pa gang yin pa ste/ 
208a6(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor 'di ni gang gis sems can thams cad kyi mchog nyid du byed kyang des rlom sems su ma byed pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po'i sems rlabs pa che'o// rab 'thor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
208a7(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen pos mi skul ba'i sems dang ldan par bya ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi skul ba nyid ni 'di yin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la byed cing de rlom 
208a8(mdo 'grel): sems su mi byed pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni gang gis sems can thams cad kyi mchog nyid du 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i sems phul ba'o// rab 'bor gzhan yang byang chub sem 
208b1(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems ni 'di yin te/ sems can thams
208b2(mdo 'grel): cad skyob cing sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba gang yin pa des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba med pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni gang la gnas na sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi sde chen po'i

208b4(mdo 'grel): da na@/ 'a pag na pa/ dag na/ 
208b5(mdo 'grel): yin pa ste/ 'di ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o// de la chos la kun dga' ba gang zhe na/ chos sgom zhing mang du byed pa gang yin pa ste/ 'di ni chos la kun dga' ba zhes bya'o// de la chos la dga' ba dang / kun dga' ba'i rnal
208b6(mdo 'grel): 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/ mngon par sbyor ba ste/ 'di ni chos la dga' ba dang / chos la kun dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha
208b7(mdo 'grel): rol du phyin pa la spyod pas sems can gyi phung po chen po dang / sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog nyid du 'gyur bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes 
208b8(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po dang / sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog

209a2(mdo 'grel): la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
