209a7(mdo 'grel): cad kyi mchog nyid du sems pa'i sems chen po nyid do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gi skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
209a8(mdo 'grel): dgasas mas sa // na sa / sa se ma da mami ni panas pa pa thams 
209b1(mdo 'grel): shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lwa ba dang / sems can dul ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / skye ba po lta ba dang / gso bar blta ba dang / skyes bur lta ba dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes 
209b2(mdo 'grel): dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba bor la ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / nag par lwa ba dang / yod par lta ba dang / med par lba ba dang / phung por lta ba dang / khams su 
209b3(mdo 'grel): lta ba dang / skye mched du lta ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar lta ba dang / pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su lta ba dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs par lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos 
209b4(mdo 'grel): ma'adres pa'i bar du lta ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong bar lta ba dang / byang chub rnam par rtogs par lta ba dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba 
209b5(mdo 'grel): dang / dge 'dun dul ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskong bar lta ba rnams te/ lba ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu spang ba'i slad du/ sems can/ mas la chos ston par bgyid kyang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bgyid de/ 
209b6(mdo 'grel): de'i yang na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes babyag// de nas tshedang ldan par ba 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu la'ang skad ces smrams// tshe dang ldan pa shA 'i bu coM phyir zhe na/ byang chu 
209b7(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba/ 
209b8(mdo 'grel): yin/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs su dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyi 
210a1(mdo 'grel): lta ba bskyed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed de/ de bzhin du rgya cher skye mched dang / khams dang / 
210a2(mdo 'grel): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar so so ba dang / bsdus pa'i bar du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do// de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'grub kyi rkang 
210a3(mdo 'grel): pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / yi ge rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / 
210a4(mdo 'grel): tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do// rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 
210a5(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ding nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang 
210a6(mdo 'grel): dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du gnas shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do// tshe dang 
210a7(mdo 'grel): ldan pa rab 'byor de'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 
210a8(mdo 'grel): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lta ba'i rnam pa de dag spang 
210b1(mdo 'grel): ba'i phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to zhes bya ba ni spong ba chen po nyid do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du/ byang chub 
210b2(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyis spobs pa bskyed cig/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 
210b3(mdo 'grel): byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems/ zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum du ma gtogs pa'i sems gang 
210b4(mdo 'grel): lags pa de la yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du/ chags pa ma mchis pa de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba'i grangs su mchi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sems de 
210b5(mdo 'grel): sems lags// na pachags pa/ nas ldan shA zun pa dang bya sa smrad sa / ldan pa gyu ma thams dpa' 
210b6(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems 
210b7(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar gzung ste/ chos 'ga' yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // 'phel ba 'am/ 'grib pa 'am/ 'ong ba dang / 'grob 
210b8(mdo 'grel): dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang la skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa dang / 'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / 'ong ba med cing 
211a1(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de la nyan thos kyi sems med do// rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu// 
211a2(mdo 'grel): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems so// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 
211a3(mdo 'grel): rab 'gror gang khyod kyis 'di skad du/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa med pa khong du chud pa med pa'i sems de la yang chags pa med do zhes gang smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rang bzhin gyis/ 
211a4(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs chags pa med pa yin nam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med pa yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chags 
211a5(mdo 'grel): pa med pa yin nam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang chags pa med pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med pa'o// skye mched dang / 
211a6(mdo 'grel): khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i bar yang chags pa med pa'o// bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yang chags pa med pa'o// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi 
211a7(mdo 'grel): bar yang chags pa med pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang chags pa med pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chags pa med pa'o// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 
211a8(mdo 'grel): khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de yang zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med pa zhes bya ba gang smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong 
211b1(mdo 'grel): pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su ma gtogs pa yin nam/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing 
211b2(mdo 'grel): khongs su ma gdogs pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni de bzhin te/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// / 
211b3(mdo 'grel): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag 
211b4(mdo 'grel): pa med cing khong du chud pa med do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar yin na/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su ma gdog pa yin nam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed// 
211b5(mdo 'grel): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su ma gtogs pa yin nam/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa 
211b6(mdo 'grel): bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med pa yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 
211b7(mdo 'grel): bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa 
211b8(mdo 'grel): med cing khongs su chud pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
212a1(mdo 'grel): pa rnams kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud ba med do// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du sems med pa'i phyir sems de 
212a2(mdo 'grel): la yang chags pa med do zhes smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyang gzugs med pa la chags pa med pa yin na/ tshor ba yang tshor ba med pa la chags pa med pa yin nam/ 'du shes kyang 'du shes med pa la chags pa 
212a3(mdo 'grel): med pa yin nam/ 'du byed rnams kyang 'du byed med pa la chags pa med pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa yang rnam par shes pa med pa la chags pa med pa yin nam/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang byang chub kyi phyog 
212a4(mdo 'grel): chos rnams med pa la chags pa med pa yin nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med pa la chags pa med pa yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 
212a5(mdo 'grel): bar yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med pa la chags pa med pa yin no// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs kyang gzugs med pa la chags pa med do// 
212a6(mdo 'grel): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang / rnam par shes pa med pa la chags pa med do// de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba so so ba dang / bsdus pa rnam 
212a7(mdo 'grel): dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par shes pa yang rnam par shes pa med pa la chags pa med do// pha rol tu phyin pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub 
212a8(mdo 'grel): kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sa das rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med pa la chags pa med do// tshe dang ldan pa 
212b1(mdo 'grel): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin 
212b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i sems des kyang chos thams cad la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su 'gyur ba med mngon par chags par 'gyur ba med de/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa chen 
212b3(mdo 'grel): po nyid do 'di dag gis ni sgrub pa'i ched du bya ba bstan to// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' 
212b4(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig/ gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can 
212b5(mdo 'grel): lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can lags la/ de ni theg pa chen por yang dag par gnas pa'i sems can lags te/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
212b6(mdo 'grel): chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos zhes 
212b7(mdo 'grel): bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byang chub kyi don du spyod pa na sems can nyung zad nyi tshe zhig gi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sbyin/ 
212b8(mdo 'grel): pa yongs su gtong ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // de bzhin du byang chub kyi don du spyod pa na sems can nyi tshe ba zhig gi/ 
213a1(mdo 'grel): don du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas 
213a2(mdo 'grel): shing shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang sems can thams cad kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
213a3(mdo 'grel): chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig ni phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mi bya'o zhe 'am/ sems can 'di snyed 
213a4(mdo 'grel): cig ni byang chub tu dgod par bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o zhes sems can yongs su bcad pas go cha mi gyon gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi don du go 
213a5(mdo 'grel): na / na sa/ sna pa'i pa na sa sa ma par / sa y-i/ m+bu stsu / 
213a6(mdo 'grel): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 
213a7(mdo 'grel): bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// de bzhin du bdag gis kyang byang chub kyi chos rnams dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms 
213a8(mdo 'grel): par 'jug pa bsgom par bya/ gzhan yang de dag la dgod par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 
213b1(mdo 'grel): bco brgyad la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskyed do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de tsam gyis na byang chub 
213b2(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos zhes bya ba ni bsgrub pa'i rang gi ngo bo yin no// // bam po bcu bzhi pa// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
213b3(mdo 'grel): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas yongs su gtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang 
213b4(mdo 'grel): sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod 
213b5(mdo 'grel): cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa 
213b6(mdo 'grel): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yid la byed pa spong ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes 
213b7(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi 
213b8(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa gtong ba na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rtog pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
214a1(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems 
214a2(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus mi gtong ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
214a3(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
214a4(mdo 'grel): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba na 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing / de la dmigs pa 
214a5(mdo 'grel): gcig pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 
214a6(mdo 'grel): sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin 
214a7(mdo 'grel): pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ sbyin pa po yang mi dmigs/ len pa po yang mi 
214a8(mdo 'grel): dmigs/ sbyin par bya ba yang mi dmigs pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol 
214b1(mdo 'grel): du phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas pha rol tu phyin pa de dag la mtshan mar mi byed pa de'i 
214b2(mdo 'grel): tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i go cha chen po bgos par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po'i go cha ste dang po'o// / 
214b3(mdo 'grel): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba
214b4(mdo 'grel): de dag sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims
214b5(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul 
214b6(mdo 'grel): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / kan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang mos pa ni mi skyed na/ so so'i skye bo'i sa la lta smos kyang ci smos pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
214b7(mdo 'grel): po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan 
214b8(mdo 'grel): pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rtog pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
215a1(mdo 'grel): sdud pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cheran po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 
215a2(mdo 'grel): rdul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brtson 'grus rnams par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyang pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha ral du tshud 
215a3(mdo 'grel): nyan pas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyig me brgyad cing dge pa rtsa ba de yang sems can pams ca b+han mang duHsa// blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du yongs su bsngo ba 'din byang chu 
215a4(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa rdul khrims kyi pha ral tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i bas ma gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// cha dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa rnam 
215a5(mdo 'grel): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phud pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad su mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing / tshul thams des rnam sems su 
215a6(mdo 'grel): mi byed de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshul khrims de yang mi dmigs shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yangs 
215a7(mdo 'grel): su bsnga ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems 
215b1(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa 
215b2(mdo 'grel): drug po'i go cha ste gnyis pa'o// // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 
215b3(mdo 'grel): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa gtong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems 
215b4(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu 
215b5(mdo 'grel): phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims yongs su bsrung zhing / dge ba'i 
215b6(mdo 'grel): rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu 
215b7(mdo 'grel): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams 
215b8(mdo 'grel): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos de dag la bzod pa dang mas pa dang / rtog pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i 
216a1(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa 
216a2(mdo 'grel): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol 
216a3(mdo 'grel): pAl sa lus pa snan / ma nga ldan pa / bas dang / rang sa ca na na 
216a4(mdo 'grel): ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod 
216a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan pos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan 
216a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i yid la bye bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te// 
216a7(mdo 'grel): bzod pa des rlom sems su mi byed cing / bzod pa mi dmigs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// / 
216a8(mdo 'grel): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen 
216b1(mdo 'grel): po bgos pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa'i go cha ste gsum pa'o// // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi 
216b2(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge 
216b3(mdo 'grel): ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 
216b4(mdo 'grel): pha ral du phyin pa la spyad pa'i snyan par pha rab tu rtso pal// ma dang na pa shA pa brug na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'an pa 'artson 'grus kyi pa la du lda pa la spyang cang/ na 
216b5(mdo 'grel): dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims bsrung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can dang thun mong du byas 
216b6(mdo 'grel): te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
216b7(mdo 'grel): pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan 
216b8(mdo 'grel): pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rtog pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha 
217a1(mdo 'grel): rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sa
217a2(mdo 'grel): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can thams cad kyi don du brtson

217a5(mdo 'grel): sems kyi tshig tu byed pa 'di na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' can pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ldan pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha la du phyin pa'o// tsha ldan pa shA d+hA'i bru gzhan yang byung 
217a6(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma

217a8(mdo 'grel): yang mi dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag pa'i rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

217b2(mdo 'grel): pa ni/ pha rol du phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir ge cha chen po bags zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug po'ogo cha ste bzhi pa'o// // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gnan 
217b3(mdo 'grel): yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po'i bas ma gtan gyi pa rol tu phyin pa la snang nga / nan pas dge rang sangs rgyu dang ldanapa yangs byabs ma yinaH/ rnam pa thams pad mkhyen pa 
217b4(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub 
217b5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// cha dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam 
217b6(mdo 'grel): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas me yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cid mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims bsrung zhing / dge 
217b7(mdo 'grel): ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi

218a1(mdo 'grel): dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa yongs su bsgom ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de// 
218a2(mdo 'grel): yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin 
218a3(mdo 'grel): pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi// 
218a4(mdo 'grel): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed de/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong 
218a5(mdo 'grel): du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol 
218a6(mdo 'grel): phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems 
218a7(mdo 'grel): rtse gcig tu byed de/ de la dmigs pa cig pa'i phyir nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnams kyi go mi 'byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ 
218a8(mdo 'grel): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod 
218b1(mdo 'grel): pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par byed na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs
218b2(mdo 'grel): rgyus dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas/ chos thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bsam gtan des kyang rlom
218b3(mdo 'grel): sems su mi byed cing bsam gtan de yang mi dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di 
218b4(mdo 'grel): mas da sa sa rnams sa

218b6(mdo 'grel): drag po go cha ste lnga pa'o// // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan 
218b7(mdo 'grel): po'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mo 
218b8(mdo 'grel): dbyas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 
219a1(mdo 'grel): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi// 
219a2(mdo 'grel): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims yongs su bsrung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
219a3(mdo 'grel): thang chub tu sangs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' na tho shes pha ral tu phyin pa la phu pa'i tshul thams kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// dang ldan pa shA ra'i thagan na 
219a4(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan 
219a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa mos shing rtog ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs 
219a6(mdo 'grel): su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu byin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems

219b1(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
219b2(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhing dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig 
219b3(mdo 'grel): dag pa tsa ba de yang thams can thams pa dang than ma du \u0f7fsa// then pad nga dag par rdzogs par byung ba tu sangs su bcwa ba di ni/ chu ba rnams dpa' sems dpa 
219b4(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
219b5(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par byed de/ de yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas pha 
219b6(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / chos thams cad la sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / brag cha dang / gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 
219b7(mdo 'grel): de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
219b8(mdo 'grel): pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis pha rol tu phyin 
220a1(mdo 'grel): pa drug po 'di dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed/ mi dmigs pa de ltar na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes 
220a2(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ go cha chen po bgos par 'gyur ba yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa re res gnas nas 
220a3(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin po drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug po'i go cha ste drug pa'o// // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
220a4(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug par byed kyang bsam gtan rnams kyi ro myang bar mi byed/ de dag gis 'phrog par yang mi 'gyur te/ de dag gi dbang gis skye ba yang ma yin/ de bzhin du 
220a5(mdo 'grel): tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa la snyoms par 'jug par byed kyang de dag gir myang bar me byed/ de dag gis 'phrog par yang mi 'gyur/ de dag gi dbang gis sde ba yang ma yin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems 
220a6(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam 
220a7(mdo 'grel): gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smod pa med pa mthong bas gnas kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byed pa ma yin pa 'di 
220a8(mdo 'grel): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i thams mkhas pa'i go cha chen po ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
220b1(mdo 'grel): go cha chen po bgos pa des na sems dpa' chen po zhes brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha chen po bgos pa la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
220b2(mdo 'grel): 'das rnams ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing yongs su spogs pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can 
220b3(mdo 'grel): da/ na mangs sadag par byed// rna b+hU nyam par la pa ma sa rnags sa / 
220b4(mdo 'grel): go cha'i sgrub pa bstan zin to// // shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par 'jug pa dang / theg pa chen 
220b5(mdo 'grel): po la 'jog par 'gyur ba yin/ gang pos spras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i 
220b6(mdo 'grel): chos kyi dben pa rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum 
220b7(mdo 'grel): pa dang / bzhi pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bzhin du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye 
220b8(mdo 'grel): mched la snyoms par 'jug pa ste/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'o// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang // 
221a1(mdo 'grel): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan mas mnyam par 'jog cing ldang ba na 
221a2(mdo 'grel): dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bzhin du tshul khrims 
221a3(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang brjod par bya'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
221a4(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ bsam gtan bzhi la mnyam par 'jog par byed/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug par byed/ gang gi 
221a5(mdo 'grel): tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag gis gnas shing / de bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug 
221a6(mdo 'grel): pa 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa na/ nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma yid la byed pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang gzhan yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
221a7(mdo 'grel): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes
221a8(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni/ theg pa chen po la rab tu zhugs pa yin no// sems can rnams kyang yongs 
221b1(mdo 'grel): su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldang ba'i 'jug pa yin no// / 
221b2(mdo 'grel): shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rab du spang ba'i phyir chos bstan par
221b3(mdo 'grel): bya'o snyam pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la 
221b4(mdo 'grel): bya bas bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang 'di lta ste/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems sam/ 
221b5(mdo 'grel): sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam 
221b6(mdo 'grel): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi gnas pa na 'di snyam ste/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mong/ 
221b7(mdo 'grel): pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to snyam du sems shing yid la byed pa de dag la 'dod pa dang / bzod pa dang / nye bar rtog pa dang / rtogs pa dang / des par sems par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 
221b8(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / 
222a1(mdo 'grel): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang / ban pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir/ brtson 
222a2(mdo 'grel): 'grus mi gtong ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 
222a3(mdo 'grel): yid la bya bas bsam gdan dang / gzugs med pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang / mi dmigs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems 
222a4(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'i yan lag rnams la mi 
222a5(mdo 'grel): rnam pa dang/ ma / bad / sa / nas pa nga / kyi nas gas 
222a6(mdo 'grel): gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing de dag gis rlom sems su mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
222a7(mdo 'grel): phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi 'jug pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa 
222a8(mdo 'grel): shA ri'i bu gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar 
222b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 
222b2(mdo 'grel): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom par byed pa 'di ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni/ 'phags pa'i lam la 'jug 
222b3(mdo 'grel): pa'o// // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byams pa dang ldan pa sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ khon med pa/ 
222b4(mdo 'grel): 'gran d+hA med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ thams cad du song ba shin du bsgoms pas rdzogs gcig gi 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis rmas pa/ nam mtha'i mthas gdugs pas thams cad dang 
222b5(mdo 'grel): ldan pa'i 'jig rten khyab par byas shing / nye bar bsgrubs nas gnas pa nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du khyab par byas shing nye bar bsgrubs nas gnas so// de snying rje dang ldan pa dang / 
222b6(mdo 'grel): dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ thams cad 
222b7(mdo 'grel): du song ba shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig gi 'dzag rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten khyab par byas shing / nye bar bsgrubs nas 
222b8(mdo 'grel): gnas pa nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi bar du khyab par byas shing nye bar bsgrubs nas gnas so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i 
223a1(mdo 'grel): ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog cing bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab par bya'o zhes de la gzhol bar byed/ snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog cing / 
223a2(mdo 'grel): sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / snying brtse ba la gzhol bar byed/ dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog cing / bdag nyid kyi sems can dga' bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la gzhol bar 
223a3(mdo 'grel): byed/ bdang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog cing / sems can rnams zag pa zad pa la rab tu gzhol bar byed de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod
223a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma la mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam pa 
223a5(mdo 'grel): ldan yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba ma gtogs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams 
223a6(mdo 'grel): la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag 
223a7(mdo 'grel): 'dres par rnam par spyod cing / sa gnyis po nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'dod pa mi skyed kyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bzod pa dang / 'dod pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 
223a8(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed 
223b1(mdo 'grel): pas mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i don du brtson 'grus mi gtong bas rnam par spyod pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa
223b2(mdo 'grel): rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la yang mnyam 
223b3(mdo 'grel): par 'jog la/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye zhing / de dag gi ro myong bar byed pa yang med la/ de dag gis 'phrogs par yang mi 'gyur 
223b4(mdo 'grel): ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
223b5(mdo 'grel): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la yang mnyam par 'jog cing / rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang // 
223b6(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang nyan thos dang / rang sang/ 
223b7(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi skyon med par 'jug par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub 
223b8(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni tshad med pa la 'jug pa'o// // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen 
224a1(mdo 'grel): po ni nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med 
224a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa gang yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA 
224a3(mdo 'grel): ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ chos thams cad la sems rnam par g.yeng ba med par mnyam par gzhag pa'i shes pa gang yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i 
224a4(mdo 'grel): bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug
224a5(mdo 'grel): mi rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / ma zhi ba zhes bya ba dang / stong pa dang / mi stong pa dang / mtshan ma yod pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa 
224a6(mdo 'grel): yod pa dang / smon pa med ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems 
224a7(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang 'das pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi dus la shes pa 'jug par mi byed de/ de gsum po 'di gsum la mi dmigs pa'i tshul
224a8(mdo 'grel): gyis shes pa mi 'jug pa 'di ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
224b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i thug pa chen po na 'dad pa'i khams su shes pa mi 'jug par mi byed/ gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa 'dag par mi byed de/ 'dadu pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams la 
224b2(mdo 'grel): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes pa 'jug pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
224b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i zag pa na can 'ganan pa dang / rternams 'das pa' tshas dang / ga pa dang bcas pa dang / bag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dres mabyas kyi ngas la shes pa 'jug par mabyed de/ 
224b4(mdo 'grel): zhen pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mi shes pa yang med/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes 
224b5(mdo 'grel): pa mi 'jug pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa la sbyor ba'i 'jug pa'o// // shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis 
224b6(mdo 'grel): na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la zhugs pa zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol 
224b7(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la 'dzeg kyang / des sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa mi dmigs te/ sbyin pa po dang / len pa po dang / sbyin pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dmigs 
224b8(mdo 'grel): su med pa de lta na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la 'dzeg pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha 
225a1(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dzeg kyang de mi dmigs pa dang / shes rab
225a2(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jog kyang des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so// byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs pa'i yid la byed pa mi dmigs pa'i 
225a3(mdo 'grel): tshul gyis dmigs su med pa de ltar na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la 'dzeg pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa la 'jug 
225a4(mdo 'grel): pa'o// // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas sgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i don du/ 
225a5(mdo 'grel): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom par byed de/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la 'dzeg pa zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bu
225a6(mdo 'grel): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa ma 'dres pas sgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i don du stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa 
225a7(mdo 'grel): dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom par byed de/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la 'dzeg pa zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bu 
225a8(mdo 'grel): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas sgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang // 
225b1(mdo 'grel): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom par byed de/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
225b2(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la 'dzeg pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di ni tha snyad tsam de/ 
225b3(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o zhes bya ba de ltar shes so// gzugs su dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya bar shes so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
225b4(mdo 'grel): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o zhes bya bar de ltar shes so// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 
225b5(mdo 'grel): 'byung ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya bar shes so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta 
225b6(mdo 'grel): ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar de ltar shes so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu 
225b7(mdo 'grel): phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya bar shes so// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams 
225b8(mdo 'grel): dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams zhes bya bar shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang 
226a1(mdo 'grel): dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces 
226a2(mdo 'grel): bya bar shes so// nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta sde nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar shes so// phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta 
226a3(mdo 'grel): bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar shes so// de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ 
226a4(mdo 'grel): de bzhin nyid ces bya bar shes so// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos nges pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' 
226a5(mdo 'grel): dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya bar shes so// byang chub dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub ces bya bar shes so// sangs rgyas 
226a6(mdo 'grel): dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas zhes bya bar yang dag par shes te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po 
226a7(mdo 'grel): la 'dzeg pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni ched du bya ba la 'jug pa'o// // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nye bar bzung ste/ snying po 
226b1(mdo 'grel): byang chub la 'dug gi bar du mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir na sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas gang la mchod pa dang 
226b2(mdo 'grel): bkur sti byar 'os pa'i mchod pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bkur stir byed/ tha mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las kyang chos nyan de/ 'di 
226b3(mdo 'grel): lta ste/ theg pa chen po 'di nyid do// de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa de la 'jog nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/ sems 
226b4(mdo 'grel): can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang / de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung / sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung / sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung ngo / de gnyis su med pa'i sa 
226b5(mdo 'grel): la gnas shing / lus ji lta bus sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i mthu yod pa de lta bu'i lus ched du bsams shing yongs su 'dzin to// de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par ma gyur gyi 
226b6(mdo 'grel): bar du theg pa chen po de dang nam yang mi 'bral lo zhes bya ba ni mngon par shes pa la 'jug pa'o// // des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob nas kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams 
226b7(mdo 'grel): cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskor bar mi 
226b8(mdo 'grel): nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 
227a1(mdo 'grel): 9/ na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig 
227a2(mdo 'grel): theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa mchog la 'dzegs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob bo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs 
227a3(mdo 'grel): su brjod pa mdzad do// de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / snying gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi 
227a4(mdo 'grel): bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig theg 
227a5(mdo 'grel): pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la 'dzegs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob bo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog 
227a6(mdo 'grel): cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la 'dzegs pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug
227a7(mdo 'grel): pa'o// // 'di dag gis ni 'jug pa'i sgrub pa bstan to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos pa/ go cha 
227a8(mdo 'grel): chen po bgos pa zhes brjod pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos zhes bgyi ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 
227b1(mdo 'grel): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos theg pa chen po'i go cha 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i
227b2(mdo 'grel): go cha dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha dang / shes 
227b3(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi go cha bgos// 
227b4(mdo 'grel): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i go cha bgos/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi go cha bgos/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med 
227b5(mdo 'grel): pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i go cha bgos/ mngon par shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos 
227b6(mdo 'grel): ma 'dres pa cobargyad / rnam pa mkhyen pa nyid kyig sa bgos/ ma banas na/ song gsum gyi snang chen pa'i 'a gtan gyi khams 'di snang ba 
227b7(mdo 'grel): bkang ste/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gan+d+ha'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / 
227b8(mdo 'grel): nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam par 'gyur ba drug 
228a1(mdo 'grel): tu rab tu bskyod do// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu rab tu bskyod do// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / 
228a2(mdo 'grel): byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam par 'gyur ba rab tu bskyed do// des stong gsum 
228a3(mdo 'grel): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas shing sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal rab tu btsal nas/ de bzhin gshegs 
228a4(mdo 'grel): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba 
228a5(mdo 'grel): dang / bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na// 
228a6(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / de dag tu skye ste/ lha dang mi'i skye ba yongs su 'dzin to// de bzhin du byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang / gshin rje'i 
228a7(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten pa'i sems can de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang / gang nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
228a8(mdo 'grel): 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye ste/ lha dang mi'i skye ba yongs su 'dzin to// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas
228b1(mdo 'grel): pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du sems can dmyal ba pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag cig mngon par sprul la/ 
228b2(mdo 'grel): de ltar mngon par sprul nas ngan song gi sems can de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi snga spogs par gyur te/ de nas sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra 
228b3(mdo 'grel): dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas nas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dang de dag las rnam par langs par gyur na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems 
228b4(mdo 'grel): sgyu ma'i mkhan po dang / sgyu ma'i mkhan pa'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par bslang ba 
228b5(mdo 'grel): yid dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyogs bcu'i 
228b6(mdo 'grel): na rnams ca ma mangs med pa'i sems can mas byu ga ma las mangs su dkyil yang sems can ga ming ya sa suHla pang byas pa ma / ra na/ ra kyi 
228b7(mdo 'grel): sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyi de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni snying 
228b8(mdo 'grel): rje tshogs so// // rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
229a1(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul par byed do// de ltar be zlar+ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul nas/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon par 
229a2(mdo 'grel): sprul par byed do// de ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprul nas/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi sbyin pa byed do// skom 'dod pa rnams la skom/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon 
229a3(mdo 'grel): pa/ gos 'dod pa rnams la gos/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog/ phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba/ spos 'dod pa rnams la spos/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la brug pa/ mal cha 'dod pa 
229a4(mdo 'grel): rnams la mal cha/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tshe ba/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams la yo byad/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la rtsi dang yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do// 
229a5(mdo 'grel): nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dang dngul 'dod pa rnams la nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dang 
229a6(mdo 'grel): dngul gyi sbyin pa byed cing / mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du sbyin par byed de/ des de ltar zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin nas/ sems can de dag 
229a7(mdo 'grel): la chos ston pa ni 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i tshes bstan pa 'di nyid ston to// sems can de dag gis kyang chos bstan pa de thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
229a8(mdo 'grel): byang chub tu sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa 
229b1(mdo 'grel): zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung 
229b2(mdo 'grel): ba'i bar du byin na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ci sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa des/ sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom 
229b3(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor los sgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprul te/ 
229b4(mdo 'grel): zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin/ mi yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin yang / sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa med de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ 
229b5(mdo 'grel): chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa'i tshogs so// // rab 
229b6(mdo 'grel): 'dung gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa rlos khams kyi pha rol tu ston pa la gnas shing ca dubs pas de ste ga sangs su bzang bas khrims snang ba'i rigs su sbyin 
229b7(mdo 'grel): 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas/ sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu 'god do// bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 
229b8(mdo 'grel): 'dzag pa can dang / sa kyi chags kyims rnams dang / ngabanan gagags pa skabs pa'i ba dang // ma chags pa pa dang / mas yang dag pa dag pa pan dang / sang 
230a1(mdo 'grel): 6/ ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sems can rab tu 'god de/ sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi 
230a2(mdo 'grel): bar du/ chos bstan pa de dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor 
230a3(mdo 'grel): 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco 
230a4(mdo 'grel): brgyad kyi bar la bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa des sems can gang yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa yod 
230a5(mdo 'grel): dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du 
230a6(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la bkod kyang / 
230a7(mdo 'grel): sems can gang yang de dag la bkod pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir de/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems/ 
230a8(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims kyi tshogs so// // bam po bco lnga pa// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
230b1(mdo 'grel): bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing 'jog la rab tu 'god do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
230b2(mdo 'grel): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing 'jog la rab tu 'gad pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
230b3(mdo 'grel): ldan pa sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzungs/ 'dren dag sa na// bal sems can thams cad bdag la dza da/ dbyug pa dang / gachung rgyas brdeg sa mtshan gyis 'dabs kyang dul 
230b4(mdo 'grel): bdag gis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam yang bskyed par mi bya zhing sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa de 'dra ba la rab tu dgod par bya'o snyam mo// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ 
230b5(mdo 'grel): sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 
230b6(mdo 'grel): sbyar zhing gzhog la rab tu 'god pa byas na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam// 
230b7(mdo 'grel): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa de 
230b8(mdo 'grel): snyed dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung nas/ chos 
231a1(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni bzod pa'i 
231a2(mdo 'grel): tshogs so// // rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la 
231a3(mdo 'grel): yang dag par sbyor zhing gzhog la rab tu 'god do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad brtson 
231a4(mdo 'grel): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sbyor ba dang / gzhog la rab tu 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan/ 
231a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i sems bskyed pas/ sems can thams cad lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la yang dag par sbyor zhing gzhog la rab tu 'god do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ 
231a6(mdo 'grel): sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul ste/ lus dang sems kyi 
231a7(mdo 'grel): brtson 'grus la bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa yod dam/ 
231a8(mdo 'grel): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med 
231b1(mdo 'grel): pa de snyed pa de dag lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod kyang / lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos 
231b2(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyi tshogs so// // rab 
231b3(mdo 'grel): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sbyor zhing 
231b4(mdo 'grel): gnag la rab tu 'god do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
231b5(mdo 'grel): la sbyor zhing gzhog la rab tu 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi chos nyid mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing / chos gang la yang 
231b6(mdo 'grel): rnam par g.yeng ba 'am rnam par mi g.yeng bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par 
231b7(mdo 'grel): sbyor zhing gzhog pa dang rab tu 'god pa byed de/ de ltar yang dag par sbyar ba rnams kyang nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du 
231b8(mdo 'grel): nam yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i 
232a1(mdo 'grel): bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du//

232a4(mdo 'grel): gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i 
232a5(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan gyi tshogs so// // rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab 
232a6(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sbyor zhing gzhog la rab tu 'god do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
232a7(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sbyor ba dang / gzhog pa rab tu 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la 
232a8(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang yang tshu rol tam/ pha rol tu mi dmigs te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
232b1(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sbyor zhing gzhog la rab tu 'god do// rab 'byor 
232b2(mdo 'grel): 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon 
232b3(mdo 'grel): par sprul te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sbyar te gzhag la rab tu bkod na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhes 
232b4(mdo 'grel): sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du 
232b5(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
